Ingredientes Para las tortas fritas:
- 1/2 kg de harina
- 4 cdas de grasa o manteca
- 1/2 taza de agua
- 2 cditas de sal
- Aceite o grasa de vaca para fre√≠r, c/n

Preparaci√≥n:

- De las tortas fritas Poner en un bol la harina cernida y colocar en el centro la grasa a temperatura ambiente.
- Con la punta de los dedos ir tomando la masa, agregando de a poco el agua con la sal y seguir hasta formar un bollo.
- Amasarlo en√©rgicamente hasta que la masa forme ampollas en su superficie.
- Dejar reposar durante 1 o 2 horas y luego cortar peque√±as pelotitas, achatarlas con la palma de la mano y pincharlas con un tenedor.
- Fre√≠rlas enseguida en abundante aceite o grasa muy caliente, retirar con espumadera y colocar sobre papel blanco las torta fritas para que se escurran.
- Espolvorearlas con az√∫car molida.

This is not the first time I have played and beaten this game nor will it be the last. This game is a perfect blend of comedy, puzzles, story, and portals. No matter if its full price or on sale it's worth every single dollar. Now if you'll excuse me, i'm gonna play this in the shower on the switch.
This is a great game. I recently repurchased it because one of my friends got it and the co op is very fun. Would definitely recommend this to a friend.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
Bastante entretenido para jugarlo con un amigo y que ambos entrenen la mente owo

Great story line and quite a good game.

This has to be in my Top 3 games of all time. The first one was immaculate, and this one is even better imo. The story is fantastic, the puzzles are challenging and fun, and GlaDOS is at her absolute best. Playing this game is worth it for her alone, shes one of the best videogame antagonists of all time, and Ellen McClain does an absolutely stellar job providing her voice. 

The addition of the co op mode is great, i played it through with my friend (who is much better at puzzle solving than i am) and we had a great time, solving the actual puzzles but also just f*cking around and annoying GlaDOS

Unless the game description sounds unappealing to you, please give this game a try, you wont regret it.
They don't let you shoot the other robot, which is unfortunate because they are stupid :(
